DOC.brief_summary: Primary Hypothesis : Acute tocolysis ( 48 hour ) use oral nifedipine effective intravenous magnesium sulfate prolong pregnancy woman preterm labor intact membrane 24 32 6/7 week ' gestation .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Magnesium Sulfate Tocolysis Versus Nifedipine Tocolysis Women With Preterm Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To compare efficacy oral nifedipine versus IV magnesium sulfate rate preterm delivery < 37 week woman preterm labor 24 32 6/7 week gestation . Secondary Objective : 1 . To compare maternal side effect two tocolytic agent 2 . To compare neonatal morbidity two study group .
DOC.criteria: Women preterm labor 24 32 6/7 week ' gestation intact membrane age range 15 50 year old . Cervical dilatation â‰¥ 6 cm Maternal contraindication tocolysis Known fetal anomaly Suspected chorioamnionitis Nonreassuring fetal heart trace Vaginal bleeding due placenta previa abruptio placenta Preterm premature rupture membrane Prolapsed membrane Human immunodeficiency virus positive Multiple gestation Patients procardia within 24 hour po intake Magnesium sulfate tocolysis prior randomization Patient refusal
